analyzed: dhātupāṭha vilāsiniyā

original: Jagu paṅkaja saṅghāte bodhayī paṇamāmi taṃ.

original: Saddhammabhānu yo lokā lokaṃ katvāna dhī tamaṃ;

original: Saṅghatoyaruho pāṇa lī tosesi namāmi taṃ-

saḥ theraḥ theḥ anvaye rataḥ

original: Yāci maṃ abhigantvāna mitto me vaṅkamānaso.

na iti ādikam
khādāpenti it ca ādini
āharitvāna dīpeyya payoga kusalaḥ

original: Kathito sacca saṅkhepe paccanta vacanena ve;

iti dassanataḥ vā api paccatta vacanam thiram
tathā dhajagga suttante muninā hac ca bhāsite
saḥ pahīyissati iti
bhāvena

analyzed: sanni nipphādanā na iva sakkaṭa ādi vacaḥ
paccatta dassanena iva purisattaya yojanam
ekavacanikam ca api bahuvacanikam pi ca
kātabba m iti no khantī parassa pada ādike

atti liṅgam dvivacanam

porāṇa metam atula netam

yaḥ

analyzed: mahā theraḥ khe mā supākaṭaḥ
vimala sāra kavi
dutiyaḥ tassa pariyatti visāradaḥ
nāmaḥ me āceraḥ thera puṅgavaḥ

original: Tatiyo tassa sisso si sikkhāgārava saññuto-

vikhyāta cime duve

ñāṇa ānanda mahā thera ssantikā iva samuggahum

original: Tesu kho padumārāma mahāthero avaṃ mamaṃ,
analyzed: tesu kho mahā theraḥ
sikkhayi sadda satthe ca pāḷiya ṭṭhakathāsu ca

sissena ñāṇatilaka therena saṃsasāminā

ādi muddāpanaṃ
